名越しの祓: (なごしのはらえ) - summer purification rites (held at shrines on the last day of the 6th lunar month)
名跡: (めいせき) - famous historic spot; family name/professional name
名蹟: (めいせき) - famous historic spot; family name/professional name
名車: (めいしゃ) - famous or exceptional car
名辞論理学: (めいじろんりがく) - term logic
名選手: (めいせんしゅ) - great player; star player
名酒: (めいしゅ) - famous brand of sake; choice sake
名門: (めいもん) - noted family/noble family; prestigious school, organization, business, etc.
名門大学: (めいもんだいがく) - prestigious university
名題: (なだい) - chief actor (e.g. of a kabuki play)
名題役者: (なだいやくしゃ) - (yoji) chief actor in a kabuki play; star actor; leading actors of a troupe
后宮: (こうぐう) - empress's palace/queen's palace; empress/queen
后町: (きさいまち) - women's pavilion (of the inner Heian palace)
吏僚: (りりょう) - public servant; government official
吐かす: (ぬかす) - (抜かす only) to omit/to leave out/to skip; to say/to speak
吐きけ: (はきけ) - nausea; sickness in the stomach
吐き下し: (はきくだし) - vomit and diarrhea or excreta (diarrhoea)
吐き出す: (はきだす) - to vomit; to spit out
吐き散らす: (はきちらす) - to spit out all around/to vomit all around; to spew out (e.g. dirty language)
吐き気を催す: (はきけをもよおす) - to feel nauseated; to feel sick
吐く: (tsuku) - expirar, respirar; mentir, usar (palavrões); vomitar, regurgitar, cuspir
吐く息: (はくいき) - exhaled air; one's breath
吐散らす: (はきちらす) - to spit out all around/to vomit all around; to spew out (e.g. dirty language)
吐根: (トコン) - ipecac (species of shrub, Cephaelis ipecacuanha); ipecacuanha
吐気: (はきけ) - nausea; sickness in the stomach
吐露: (とろ) - express one's mind; speak out
向い: (むかい) - facing; opposite; across the street; other side
向いている: (むいている) - to be cut out for (e.g. a job); to be suited (to)
向い側: (むかいがわ) - opposite side; other side; other party
向い合う: (むかいあう) - to be opposite; to face each other
向い合せる: (むかいあわせる) - to face; to confront; to be opposite to
向い合わせる: (むかいあわせる) - to face; to confront; to be opposite to
向う: (むかう) - to face; to go towards
向うずね: (むこうずね) - shin; front of lower leg
向う側: (むこうがわ) - other side; opposite side; other party
向う岸: (むこうぎし) - opposite bank; farther shore
向う脛: (むこうずね) - shin; front of lower leg
向う見ず: (むこうみず) - recklessness; rashness; foolhardiness; temerity; without watching where one is going
向かい: (むかい) - facing; opposite; across the street; other side
向かい側: (むかいがわ) - opposite side; other side; other party
向かい合う: (むかいあう) - to be opposite; to face each other
向かい合せる: (むかいあわせる) - to face; to confront; to be opposite to
向かい合わせる: (むかいあわせる) - to face; to confront; to be opposite to
向かい火: (むかいび) - backfire (to defend against forest fires)
向かい腹: (むかいばら) - child born to one's legal wife (as opposed to one's concubine, etc.)
向かう: (むかう) - to face; to go towards
向かうところ敵なし: (むかうところてきなし) - unbeatable; invincible; irresistible
向かうところ敵無し: (むかうところてきなし) - unbeatable; invincible; irresistible
向かう所敵なし: (むかうところてきなし) - unbeatable; invincible; irresistible
向かう所敵無し: (むかうところてきなし) - unbeatable; invincible; irresistible
向かって右: (むかってみぎ) - on the right as one faces (it)
向かって左: (むかってひだり) - on the left as one faces (it)
向き: (むき) - direction; orientation; aspect; situation; exposure; suitability; tendency
向きになる: (ムキになる) - to become serious; to take something seriously (joke, teasing); to become irritated or angry (usu. at something trivial); to get worked up
向きに成る: (ムキになる) - to become serious; to take something seriously (joke, teasing); to become irritated or angry (usu. at something trivial); to get worked up
向き不向き: (むきふむき) - different suitabilities; being cut out for certain things (and not for others)
向き付けに: (むきつけに) - to one's face; in one's presence
向き合う: (むきあう) - to be opposite; to face each other
